recipesJson.name: koffee cake
recipesJson.author: BigRed
recipesJson.description: MUST READ DESCRIPTION FIRST BEFORE MIX. I did not use (Flavor west) -coffee cake . I actually used (NORTH WEST) ( VG flavors )- coffee cake witch you can buy at over at eciggexpress.com . This mix is awesome at 1 and a half weeks but almost 70% better at at around a month steep .
